item.description: last waterfires of the year in Providence, a short train ride from Boston if you haven't been before, it's worth a look-see. Waterfires 7:00pm (http://www.waterfire....) For Dinner Folks: Catch the 2:25pm commuter-rail ($7.75 one way) from South Station to Providence. We'll plan on dinner at a restaurant TBD at 4:30pm (gives you an hour to wander around Providence and then find the restaurant) we'll have a couple hours dinner and conversation then stroll along the river by firelight 6:20pm till train home (8:52pm or 10:00pm) Waterfires only: catch the 4:45pm train from south station to providence (arrives 5:50) and catch up with us at the restaurant (or go incognito, up to you ;)

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Dinner and Waterfires in Providence
